import React from 'react' import "./SignPage.css" import HeaderBottom from '../../HeaderBottom/HeaderBottom' import Button3 from '../../SiteButtons/Button3/Button3' import SiteHeadline from '../../SiteHeadline/SiteHeadline' import { ReduxLoginForm } from '../../Forms/Login/Login' import {ReduxRegisterForm} from '../../Forms/Register/Register' import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' const SignPage=(props)=>{ if (props.isAuth) { return } const onSubmit=(formData)=>{ props.login(formData.email,formData.password) props.register(formData.name,formData.email,formData.password) } return( <>
) } export default SignPage
